name: commerce-sdk-integration-test
description: Salesforce Commerce Cloud SDK Integration Test

scripts.test: npm run test:ts && npm run test:js
scripts.bundle: rm -rf commerce-sdk*.tgz; npm pack .. && mv commerce-sdk-*.tgz commerce-sdk.tgz
scripts.bundle:clean:install: npm run clean:all && npm run bundle:install
scripts.test:prod: npm run bundle:install && npm run test
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:prod && npm run test:staging
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:node
